labels.analysis: The GPTers AI Knowledge Search Server is designed to provide easy and fast access to the knowledge base of the GPTers AI study community. Its primary function is to enable efficient searching and utilization of valuable insights within the community's vast information pool. The tool "search_gpters" suggests that the server facilitates knowledge retrieval, likely through an API-driven search mechanism tailored for the GPTers community.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Web Search & Research" was chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around searching and retrieving information from a specific knowledge base, which aligns with research-oriented tools. While it could also be categorized under "Education" due to its community study focus, "Web Search & Research" better captures its primary use case of information retrieval.

server_info_crawled.overview: GPTers AI 스터디 커뮤니티의 지식에 쉽고 빠르게 접근할 수 있습니다. 유용한 인사이트를 효율적으로 검색하고 활용하여, 방대한 정보를 바탕으로 학습 경험을 향상시킬 수 있습니다. API 키는 GPTers 운영자에게 요청하여 발급받으시기 바랍니다.

tools.name: search_gpters
tools.description: Deploy Server GPTers AI Knowledge Search Server @chat-prompt/gpters-search-mcp-server Try in Playground search_gpters

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@chat-prompt/gpters-search-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: apiSecretKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: API secret key for GPTers search service
